topics.body:
I had a surprising normal dream that was just me being awesome.

I was a part of some council, there were 24 of us and we were discussing about electing a new leader within the council members. The highest number of votes were at some dude but I objected the choice and voted on a female member in front of me. This caused an uproar as there had never been a female council president before.

As they started to criticize me, I stayed calm, drank a cup of tea, and gave them a little lesson through a speech that left them speechless. I made them remember what it was to be a leader, to live up as an example and that the leader was the symbol of the council. I told them that choosing an incompetent leader would make us look more incompetent and that incompetence through symbolism can spread, thus ruining the council, the community, the country and later the world. I told them that a leader has a lot to live up to and that responsibility is but a piece of a leader's quality.

Finally, I asked the one the voted the most an important question. "Are  you willing and capable to give your all in maintaining the safety, order and peace that a leader must uphold?" This caused him to think twice about it and declined the leader role so the female member became the next president.

I don't know why but I felt really awesome in that dream. 

It started to get weird afterwards such as glow-in-the-dark balloons and some people having not arousing sex on the table.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
